aggregate.description: Exists only when tag.type is aggregate

operation.description: Exists only when tag.type is aggregate

period.description: Exists only when tag.type is aggregate

timezone.description: As specified in OS time zone database, exists only when tag.type is aggregate

update_active.description: Exists only when tag.type is aggregate

update_interval.description: Exists only when tag.type is aggregate, empty string if update is not active

autosave.description: Exists only when tag.type is state or event

readonly.description: Exists only when tag.type is state

units.description: Exists only when tag.type is state or event or aggregate
